thread.title: Hondo’s no Saint backer
thread.title_full: Hondo’s no Saint backer | New York Post

author: Hondo
title: Hondo’s no Saint backer
text:
The Astros, unable to shake off one of the worst losses in baseball history, were obliterated by the Royals Wednesday night, which caused Hondo’s deficit to grow to 1,472 van brocklins.
Thursday: Mr. Aitch will take flight with the Dirty Birds at the Superdome — 20 units on the Saints to go marching on to another loss.
Donald Trump says as a candidate for President who’s drawing huge crowds he should be entitled to Secret Service protection. Given the agency’s shoddy record at the White House and in foreign countries, El Donaldo might want to opt for a loyal and vicious Doberman instead. … Hillary, pandering to the left, said at Tuesday’s debate: “It’s our job to rein in the excesses of capitalism.” Right on, Pantsuit! The excesses have to stop — except, of course, for charging $300,000 and up for a boring speech .
  hondo
